Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Katz' life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point during the outbreak, Katz joined a community in Ohio. Katz is amongst the soldiers at the masquerade ball. After Tyler Davis causes a disruption trying to stand up to Pamela Milton , Mercer orders Katz and Lewis to question the waiter staff to figure out how he he got in. Katz is seen patrolling the area with another soldier. Carol hides from them as they approach. Katz is among the soldiers protecting the Estates as the Commonwealth is overrun by the herd . When the Coalition and Mercer 's loyal troops arrive, they enter into a standoff with Katz and the rest of his squad. However, he eventually lowers his weapon on Vickers ' orders. [1]
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Katz has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies and unnamed people
Appearances[]: " New Haunts " (No Lines) " What's Been Lost " (No Lines) " Rest in Peace " (No Lines)
Trivia[]: Dalton Baxter also portrayed a recurring Hilltop resident since Season 7 before moving to the Commonwealth in Season 11 and becoming a soldier .
Name: Katz
